revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Hall of Origin |image = [[File:Hall of Origin.png|200px]] |caption = A map of the Hall of Origin. |tokens = 106,500 |location = East of Route 208, just above the middle of the 'mountain range' in the middle of the map. }} The '''Hall of Origin''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 2,253,000 |- | Slaking (Boss) || 8,000,000 |- | Snorlax (Boss) || 8,000,000 |- | Shuckle (Boss) || 8,000,000 |- | Blissey (Boss) || 8,000,000 |- | Arceus (normal) (Boss) || 10,000,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Slowpoke * Spearow * Garchomp * Slakoth * Eevee * Breloom * Absol * Arceus (normal) (boss) * Slaking (boss) * Snorlax (boss) * Shuckle (boss) * Blissey (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 50% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
